ygData.subject: Re: Pelts and Tailoring
ygData.msgSnippet: ... of ... I found that to get any quality wolf pelts it s best to kill the wolves in Qeynos hills. I had never gotten anything other than a ruined pelt or
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:07 24.6.1999 EDT, you wrote:
>From: PRIMEhero@...
>
> This is all well and good for medium wearers. And it is fairly well
>known that the other Karanas yield decent LQ, MQ, and HQ Bear pelts for the
>larger types (as well as the Kodiaks to the East). However, with several
>hundred puppies that have gotten their noses whacked I find no good source
of
>LQ, MQ, or HQ pelts for small sizes.
> And while on the subject, any use for LQ pelts besides resale for
>coin? Tailors use MQ (studded) and HQ (Reinforced, which last I heard wasn't
>working). LQ uses?
>

I found that to get any quality wolf pelts it's best to kill the wolves in
Qeynos hills. I had never gotten anything other than a ruined pelt or some
sort of skin before I tried the wolves there, in just a few hours I had
several HQ and med wolf pelts. Reinforced does work, it's only one or two
points of ac better than leather but I have successfully made a few pieces.
As to low quality pelts, there is a quest that uses bear and wolf pelts of
low quality in QH but that's it. Does anyone have any tips for me on where
it is best to get HQ bear pelts? I have killed countless bears for a very
long time and have only gotten my hands on 4 HQ bear pelts to work with.
And two of those I got lucky and found and bought from a store.

A. Berg
